item.title: Introduction - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: Introduction GWT Tutorial explains the design of a complete application using Google Web Toolkit (GWT) â„¢ 2.x. Written in a style keeping both beginners, as well as, intermediate developers in mind, book covers client side user interface design, server side communication, effective persistence strategies and hosting the application on Google App Engine. Fins is an GWT app developed in this book, displays financial performance of a company in a clean and easy to use user interface.
